scripts.minify-js: find assets -name "*.js" | xargs -P$(nproc || printf '2') -I {} sh -c "set -x; node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs {} -cmo {}"
scripts.minify-css: find assets -name "*.css" | xargs -P$(nproc || printf '2') -I {} sh -c "set -x; node_modules/clean-css-cli/bin/cleancss -o {} {}"
scripts.minify: npm run minify-html && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
